channel.title: Point system
channel.description:
Okay, well. i want to be able to use party crackers, with the Party hats coming from them when used on another played, like in real rs.
But, to earn the party crackers, i want them to be earned by getting points from like kbd?
So like its just basically earning the crackers from a point shop.
Anyone know how i cna do that?

item.title: Point system
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Create an integer and have that integer rise when the KBD is killed.

Base code:

public int kbdPoints = 0;

if(npcID == 50) { kbdPoints++; }

That will rise the kbdPoints integer by one.

Note: No, you canâ€™t copy and paste that and expect it to work. You will also probably have to mess around in NPCHandler a bit.

Read full topic
